reviewText: I have watched this film many times and am amazed at the sensitive portrayals of each character.  Like life ... happiness, sadness, loss and recovery.  A smart and tender film. I can recommend it.

This isn't kid stuff...these are seriously twisted people and when they bleed from their hearts, it becomes a very hard movie to ignore.  Some of the acting in this movie is so incredible you wonder why it is still such a secret treasure of discovery.

I rented it, but then I really didn't want to send it back so I came here and bought a copy.  I've watched it five times now and it blows me away even more each time.
